alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 02 at 9:47AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Northwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Northern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Garland County in central Arkansas... West central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 947 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glenwood, Amity, Daisy, Meyers, Lofton, Daisy State Park, Bismarck, Alpine, Bear Creek Public Use Area, Salem in Pike County, Bonnerdale, Shawmut, Welsh, Rosboro, Lodi, Point Cedar, Pettyview, Hopper, Kirby and Pearcy.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Pike
